thread.title: RICHARD
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by RICHARD

author: RICHARD
title: RICHARD
text: My first experience shopping at NFM was while living in Omaha. I really enjoyed shopping there then and I really like shopping NFM there now, as it is located three miles from my home. It make's it fast and easy to get and out quickly. The store is well stock with a large variety of merchandise that will satisfy any any all shoppers. Thank you for a great store and shopping experience.
